name: concessionaire
content:

Add to word list
someone who has been given a concession to sell or do something

COMMERCE a person or company who has a concession (= official permission from a government or a company to do business in a particular place): Cruise ships often staff their ships by contracting with gifts shops, beauty salons and other concessionaires. Highway concessionaires' requests to increase tolls were rejected by the state government.
